mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER(ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{memberPassword}
